description:
Criminal case - Crime case game is mystery hidden crime of hidden object

In Criminal case Graphics You Feel Real Murder Scenes and Bring Interrogate criminal and other Suspects and Do Justice.
In Criminal Case for Hidden Crime Game are Provide a 5 different City Crime Scenes With Different Level to solve the all Mystery Of Murder And Get the Criminal.
